titles.title: A bill to make surviving spouses of judicial officials who died before October 1, 1986, eligible for increased annuities which are effective as of that date.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Introduced. Amends the Judicial Improvements Act of 1985 to provide increased annuities for the surviving spouses of judicial officials who died before October 1, 1986.
